name: a002-count
title: Count
description:
Counting is a very important skill in programming.
Counting from 1 to 10 is easy, but counting for a wide range becomes more difficult.
You should write a program to count for you.
input:
There are 3 numbers in the input.
The first number is the start number.
The second number is the end number.
The third number is the step number.
output: Your program should output the numbers from the start number to the end number, with the step number.

subtasks.constraint: Numbers are in the range of `[1, 1000]`. Step is always `1`.
Numbers are in the range of `[-100000, 100000]`.
Numbers are in the range of `[-1000000000000, 1000000000000]`.
